Uses of Class
Environment.RoomSquare

  • Packages that use RoomSquare 
    Package Description
    Environment  
    Objects  

    • Uses of RoomSquare in Environment

      Methods in Environment that return RoomSquare 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RoomSquare Corridor.getLinkedRoomSquare()
      Returns the RoomSquare object that linked to this Corridor object that represents the doorway between them.
      Methods in Environment with parameters of type RoomSquare 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Corridor.setDoor(RoomSquare room)
      Set the door direction and the space that linked to it.
      void RoomSquare.setSecretPassage(RoomSquare secretRoom)
      Set the secret passage that linked with this RoomSquare.

    • Uses of RoomSquare in Objects

      Methods in Objects that return RoomSquare 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RoomSquare Room.getSecretPassageSquare()
      Return the RoomSquare object that uses as secret passage
      Methods in Objects with parameters of type RoomSquare 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Room.setSecretPassage(Room other, RoomSquare square, javax.swing.ImageIcon image)
      Set the secret passage that linked to this room by specified the other Room object and RoomSquare that using to represent on the board for map displaying.
      void Room.setSecretPassage(RoomSquare other)
      Set the other RoomSquare that linked to this room as secret passage, this mainly uses to move/set player's position.
